Welcome to Pycheron's documentation
====================================
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

Python library for seismic data quality control based on IRIS Mustang, IRISSeismic, and seismicRoll.

.. image:: _static/pycheron-diagram-update_9-28-19.png
   :align: center
